com.xtructure.xutil
Class XLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.log4j.Category
      org.apache.log4j.Logger
          com.xtructure.xutil.XLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.log4j.spi.AppenderAttachable
public final class XLogger
extends org.apache.log4j.Logger

A wrapper for Logger that adds some useful functionality.

Version:
0.9.5
Author:
Peter Nürnberg
